context.note: The trial request is applied for Cloud version only. does not support a trial for the On-Premises solution.
context.p: A valid business email registration is eligible for a 30-day trial of Katalon Platform Premium.

step.cmd: Go to katalon.com. In the homepage, click on Start free trial button in the upper right corner.

image.alt: The Katalon Platform homepage's start free trial button.

step.cmd: Enter your credentials into the sign-up page as prompted.
Your registration is confirmed when you are asked to verify your e-mail address.

image.alt: The Katalon Platform's e-mail registration page

step.cmd: Upon verification, click on the Start now button.

image.alt: The Katalon Platform verifies your account. Click on start now to continue.

step.cmd: Set up your account by filling out the following questions.

image.alt: Set up your new Katalon Platform account.

taskbody.result:
The Katalon Platform automatically configures your account and directs you to the onboarding guide. It is ready to use.
The Katalon Platform dashboard. Experienced users can skip the onboarding guide by clicking on the "x" button and selecting Close guide.
